department: Department of Public Works and Government Services

description: "EZ113-221203B: Characterization of contaminated sites in BC and YT CTA"
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement

### Tender Title

* English: Environmental Services for Contaminated Site Characterization in BC and YT
* French: Caractérisation des Sites Contaminés — Services Environnementaux pour la C.-B. et le YT

### Solicitation Information

* Reference Number: WS3719279727
* Amendment Number: 4
* Solicitation Number: WS3719279727
* Publication Date: January 2, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 15, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: February 8, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: January 31, 2026

### Tender Status

* The tender is now expired.

### Procurement Details

* Unspsc: 77000000 (Environmental Services)
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Tender Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Tender Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
